sentence.Network_en: He doesn't try to foist his beliefs on everyone.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不会勉强每个人接受他的信念.

sentence.Network_en: He tried to foist some inferior goods ( off ) on me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他企图把一些劣质货强售给我.

sentence.Network_en: He's religious but he doesn't try to foist his beliefs on everyone.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是教徒,但他不想把自己的信仰强加于人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(53) ... foist on 骗售 foist 偷偷插入 folacin 叶酸.

托福红宝书中没有的词汇(D-F)_新东方网 ... Fluted:a. 有凹槽的 Foist:v. 欺骗，蒙骗 Fugitive:n. 逃亡者;逃亡的;a.临时的，即兴的.

list.abs: Many unfit persons have been foisted into this bureau ., 这个局里塞入了许多不称职的人.
They want to renounce the pacifist constitution foisted on Japan by America ., 他们想废弃美国强加给日本的和平宪法.
He foisted himself on them for the weekend ., 他强要和他们去度周末.
foison 丰收foist into 塞进foist on 骗售

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'palm a false die, so as to produce it at the right moment'): from Dutch dialect vuisten 'take in the hand', from vuist (see fist)

auth_sentence.content: The problem is that a 4tn euros EFSF would foist an enormous potential liability on Germany.
auth_sentence.res_content: The problem is that a 4tn euros EFSF would foist an enormous potential liability on Germany.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The problem is that a 4tn euros EFSF would foist an enormous potential liability on Germany.

auth_sentence.content: It's parents who foist life on their kids, so it's the parents' responsibility to provide for them.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's parents who foist life on their kids, so it's the parents' responsibility to provide for them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's parents who foist life on their kids, so it's the parents' responsibility to provide for them.

auth_sentence.content: They see, instead, an ossified leader, trying to foist his sons on Libya as if it were a kingdom.
auth_sentence.res_content: They see, instead, an ossified leader, trying to foist his sons on Libya as if it were a kingdom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They see, instead, an ossified leader, trying to foist his sons on Libya as if it were a kingdom.

sentences.en: He doesn’t try to foist his beliefs on everyone.
sentences.cn: 他不会勉强每个人接受他的信念。

sentences.en: She resented having the child foisted on her while the parents went travelling abroad.
sentences.cn: 她对孩子的父母出国旅行卻硬要她来照看孩子这事很反感。
